value:
In wintertime, my breath fogs my
lenses. But I can't go without them,
even when wearing a costume.

My father decided I should be a
knight. The truth is, the life of a
painter would suit me better...

This is a quality gift. I'm the son of
a merchant family, so I have a better
eye for these things than most.

I include a hand-painted card with
each of my gifts. I hope each stroke
conveys my feelings for the recipient.

Askr's winter colors exude a cool
serenity. I would give anything to
truly capture that beauty on canvas!

Hello! My, what a picturesque castle!
I'm here as winter envoy, on behalf
of $Nf.

This winter wonderland is quite the
sight. I need to think on which shades
of blue will best capture the scene.

Phew... I'm glad that my gifts
escaped unharmed, at least.

It appears the burden of acting as
a winter envoy is a heavier one
than I first imagined...

Now I truly feel like I understand the
meaning of the winter festival!

My name is Ignatz Victor. I can't wait
to learn more about Askr's winter
festival. Where shall we begin?

I've been interested in what lies
beyond Fódlan's borders ever
since I knew there were borders.$k$pWhat would such lands look like?
Who were the people living there?
I used to daydream for hours.$k$pIn all those imaginings, I never
thought I'd be able to join a foreign
festival. Much less as an envoy!$k$pSuch events are special because they
only come around once a year, when
the weather and time are right.$k$pAll the more reason to capture the
moment in a painting, yes? Well, if
I can do it proper justice, that is.$k$pOf course, such a painting wouldn't
be complete if I didn't include
you, $Nu.
ふっ
ていっ
くっ
The gifts...!
I'll show you festive!
Special delivery!
Let me give you a gift!
You're going to love this!
It's...too much...
Haha!
The winter festival's once a year, right? Let's make the most of it!
Oh, it's snowing! *shiver* Cold!
The decorations in the plaza are amazing. I lost track of time while admiring them.
Oh right, a gift. Could I interest you in some paints? Or drawing paper?
My glasses fog up every time I come inside. I can't see a thing...
Someday I'll paint a landscape of this incredible scenery.

I got you something. It's not much,
but I hope you like it.
Yes.
This should work.
I'll deliver.
